content: rainbow baby rattle with teether ring 1 copyright all photos instructions given in this pdf file and video tutorial on youtube are the property of anna ushakova and are for your personal use only the patterns or parts of the patterns may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published or posted for sell or free on the internet or offline you can sell finished items made from my patterns but please clearly credit the design to www crochetclub store so i will be able to continue creating new designs for you please provide a link to my instagram @crochetclubstore 2 2 5 cm size when using similar materials the rainbow rattle will be ~ 4 1/4 length and 3 1/2 high wooden ring diameter ~ 2 5 cm 3 1/2 9 cm 4 1/4 11cm 3 materials and tools original yarn drops cotton light 50% cotton 50% polyester 105 m/115 yards per 50 g skein in 4 colors total 45 yards yarn weight dk gauge 20 stitches and 21 row = 4 inches in single_crochet crochet hook 3 00 mm notions scissors tapestry needle to sew in ends stuffing polyfil yarn straps etc rattle ball wooden ring diameter ~ 2 5 cm time - about 1 hour to save you time searching for the right materials you can use my shopping list to order the yarn and tools needed for this pattern follow the link to my site order and enjoy crocheting https //crochetclub store/rat006 4 link to download 6 abbreviations us abbreviation description blo back loop only chain chain stitch decrease decrease - 2 single_crochet together flo front loop only increase increase - work 2 single_crochet in 1 st of previous round pm place marker rs right side single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch ws wrong side … number of sts in total repeat *n repeat in brackets n times 7 c1 white yarn c2 pink yarn side of rainbow c3 blue yarn c4 green yarn 1 take c1 and chain 11 row 1 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 1 single_crochet 6 increase 2 single_crochet turn 16 row 2 15 single_crochet 1 single_crochet crochet with yarn c2 as a picture 6-8 cut the c1 yarn turn 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 5 side of rainbow take c2 row 3 3 single_crochet repeat increase 1 single_crochet *5 3 single_crochet turn 21 row 4 20 single_crochet 1 single_crochet crochet with yarn c3 as a picture 5 cut the c2 yarn turn 4 1 2 3 side of rainbow 1 take c3 row 5 3 single_crochet repeat increase 2 single_crochet *6 turn 27 row 6 26 single_crochet 1 single_crochet crochet with yarn c4 as a picture 4 cut the c3 yarn turn 2 3 4 side of rainbow take c4 row 7 2 single_crochet repeat increase 3 single_crochet *6 1 single_crochet turn 33 row 8 33 single_crochet cut the yarn wrong side side of rainbow weave in ends on the wrong side crochet the second side like
